name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its forest green box, classic arms and legs, and a retro console for buttons, Retrotron brings a touch of nostalgia to the digital world. Its classic screen displays waveforms and data with precision, while the glasses add a stylish and intellectual flair. Retrotron is a perfect blend of vintage aesthetics and modern technology.
